The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Villar del Pedroso, Caceres, Extremadura

Katherine Dau

The town of Villar del Pedroso lays on the pilgrimage route to the Royal Monastery of Guadalupe. They claim their patron as la Virgen de Burgilla.

Works cited

  1. “Villar del Pedroso”, Wikipedia.
  2. “Fiestas,” Ayuntamiento de Villar del Pedroso
